paper_abstract: Based on industry-oriented needs, a multi-function automatic measurement platform that includes over 20 kinds of sensors and measurement devices is developed and constructed. The NI USB DAQ-card is applied for external data acquisition and Labview is used for software design. The 20+ kinds of sensors and measurement devices are chosen by market investigation and expert interview. The built-in automatic measurement platform possesses superior advantages such as programmable, excellent data analysis, remote measurement, low cost and easy to maintain. Practical measurements were carried out to demonstrate the capabilities of this automatic measurement platform.
